alert.note: Alert for Jasper; Lake; Newton; Porter (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 7:30AM EDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Will, northeastern Kankakee, northern Newton, southern Porter, southern Lake and northern Jasper Counties through 715 AM CDT... At 630 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Grant Park, or near Lowell, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Crown Point, Cedar Lake, Lowell, DeMotte, Hebron, Wheatfield, Lake Village, Beecher, Roselawn, Kouts, Lake Dalecarlia, Shelby, Schneider, Boone Grove, Thayer, Sumava Resorts, Baileys Corner, Stoutsburg, Fair Oaks and Dunns Bridge. Including the following interstate... Indiana I-65 between mile markers 223 and 246. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
